module.name: document_and_version_identification
module.keywords: module, document, document identification, document version.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that identify documents and versions of documents.
The second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
No ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified.
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.
purpose.note: USE FROM product_definition_schema (product_category, product_related_product_category) added to the mim; USE FROM Product_identification_mim removed from the mim.

inscope.li: identification of a version of a document.

definition.def:
information and its support medium
A drawing, a test report, an ISO standard are examples of document.
The medium may be paper, photograph, digital files, optical computer disc, magnetic, electronic storage, or a combination thereof.

description.p: The Document_And_Version_Identification UoF specifies the data structure for the representation of the data that identifies a document and its versions.

ae.refpath: product_definition_formation {product_definition_formation.of_product -> product product <- product_related_product_category.products[i] product_related_product_category <= product_category product_category.name='document' }
